name: Like A Skater
description:
Have you got the dexterity to take on a joyful challenge with Like A Skater? This game will bring you fun time skateboarding to the beat of dance music played on the piano. Let’s roll the city road like a skater now!

► EASY TO PLAY
Just a simple tap and the urban skater boy is already there ready for the moves! You can either imagine yourself as the skater on the screen or consider him as your teammate in the challenge, whichever way, you only need to hold and drag your finger anywhere you want on the screen to collect as many music tiles as possible. With relaxing dance music on, let’s see if you can collect every note of the melody with your finger touch.

► VARIOUS SONG CHOICES
Like A Skater offers you a variety of instrumental EDM songs played on the piano with different levels of difficulty. With fast speed beat, you would need to rush a little to catch up with the tiles falling down if you do not want to miss out on any music note. The songs are all relaxing with catchy rhythm and will surely bring you joys in playing the game.

Do you feel the excitement to hit the music road on the skateboard? Download Like A Skater to enjoy fun skating now!
